TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit SizeF extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 存储有序浮点数对，通常为矩形的宽度和高度。

span.span: Stores an ordered pair of floating-point numbers, typically the width and height of a rectangle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单位结构取决于和设置用于绘制的对象。The unit for a structure depends on the and settings for the object that is used to draw. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加到卷影通过使用以下成员：The following code example adds a shadow to a by using the following members: - - - 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form. 若要运行此示例，请将此代码粘贴到窗体并调用`AddShadow`方法时处理该窗体的事件。To run this example, paste this code into a form and call the `AddShadow` method when handling the form's event. 验证该窗体包含名为`listBox1`。Verify that the form contains a named `listBox1`. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]
